alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gilchrist, Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near High Springs to 6 miles west of Bronson. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, High Springs, Archer, University Of Florida, Newberry, La Crosse and Flemington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Western Alachua; Western Marion
